mapper.sql: ${tableAlias}S_ID as "${columnPrefix}id", ${tableAlias}S_NAME as "${columnPrefix}name", ${tableAlias}D_CREATETIME as "${columnPrefix}createTime", ${tableAlias}S_CREATEWORKERID as "${columnPrefix}createWorkerId", ${tableAlias}S_CREATEWORKERNAME as "${columnPrefix}createWorkerName", ${tableAlias}C_DELETED as "${columnPrefix}deleted", ${tableAlias}D_DELETETIME as "${columnPrefix}deleteTime", ${tableAlias}S_DELETEWORKERID as "${columnPrefix}deleteWorkerId", ${tableAlias}S_DELETEWORKERNAME as "${columnPrefix}deleteWorkerName", ${tableAlias}S_UNITCODE as "${columnPrefix}unitCode", ${tableAlias}D_UPDATETIME as "${columnPrefix}updateTime", ${tableAlias}S_UPDATEWORKERID as "${columnPrefix}updateWorkerId", ${tableAlias}S_UPDATEWORKERNAME as "${columnPrefix}updateWorkerName", ${tableAlias}I_SORT as "${columnPrefix}sort"
